name: Arena (itch) (TheMost)
description:
Arena is, at its core, a game about circles.

You are a circle. Your task is to defeat the other circles, who are, appropriately, trying to defeat you.

The controls are simple: WASD to move and mouse to aim and use special abilities. The game has 12 characters, 117 levels, and a multitude of enemies. Among the characters are one who makes portals on walls, another who throws a boomerang, and another with a jetpack who can throw grenades.

Nothing about this game is complicated. It's not supposed to be. Instead, I tried to make thought-provoking level designs, clever characters and enemies, and charmingly minimalistic effects.

This is my first big game; I've made several others, but none that I have published or released. I hope you enjoy it.

So please, go ahead. Enter the arena.
